DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety intraocular pressure-lowering efficacy AL-37807 ophthalmic suspension vs. Timolol gel form solution vs. AL-37807 vehicle , dose concomitantly Xalatan , patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
